metadata.title: CVE-2024-23310 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the sopen_FAMOS_read functionalityof The Biosig Project libbiosig 2.5.0 and Master Branch (ab0ee111). Aspecially crafted .famos file can lead to arbitrary code execution. Anattacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: biosig package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
